Reference

DSL

tic-package

tic: Tasks Integrating Continuously: CI-Agnostic Workflow Definitions

get_stage() add_step() add_code_step()

tic's domain-specific language

dsl_get() dsl_load() dsl_init()

Storage for stages and steps
